english.segment1: Everythings so artificial. A fabrication of whats beautiful. I wont be satisfied in my plastic paradise
english.segment2: Give me something made to last. Im fading fast. Something to hope in. Cause everything is broken down here. Something made to last. Something made to last
english.segment3: Rock and roll - happiness - diamond rings. These are the best of the temporary things. There must be more for us. Cause it's all turning into dust
english.segment4: bridge: A kingdoms coming. And it wont stop running. It wont fade away
